## Scene.raycast() method

Cast a ray into the scene to get the closest object hit by the ray

**Signature:**

```typescript
raycast(camera: Camera, screenX: number, screenY: number): {
        node: GraphNode;
        dist: number;
        point: Vector3;
    };
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  camera | [Camera](doc/markdown/./scene.camera.md) | The camera used to compute the ray |
|  screenX | number | The x position on screen |
|  screenY | number | The y position on screen |

**Returns:**

{ node: [GraphNode](doc/markdown/./scene.graphnode.md)<!-- -->; dist: number; point: [Vector3](doc/markdown/./base.vector3.md)<!-- -->; }

The closest object hit by the ray
